name: RUNE
description:
This script will install "Rune Classic" GOG edition with support for modern screen resolution.

During install please let all options by default.

Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes: Rune Classic has bad controller support. Instead I invite you to use a keymapper like Antimicro or sc-controller. You will find profiles for x360 and Steam Controller in the "gamepad profiles" folder.

files.setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
- gppreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rune/gamepad%20profiles/rune_gamepad_readme.html
- gppx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rune/gamepad%20profiles/rune_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gppsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rune/gamepad%20profiles/rune_steam.sccprofile
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/System/Rune.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- input_menu:
    description: Select your preferred language
    id: lang
    options:
    - int: English
    - frt: French
    - itt: Italian
    - det: german
    - est: spanish
    - rut: russian
    preselect: int
- write_config:
    data:
      Engine.Engine:
        Language: $INPUT_lang
      Engine.GameEngine:
        ServerActors: IpServer.UdpServerUplink MasterServerAddress=master.333networks.com
          MasterServerPort=27900
      IpServer.UdpServerUplink:
        MasterServerAddress: master.333networks.com
      UBrowserAll:
        ListFactories[0]: UBrowser.UBrowserGSpyFact,MasterServerAddress=master.333networks.com,MasterServerTCPPort=28900,ServerRegion=0,GameName=rune
      WinDrv.WindowsClient:
        FullscreenColorBits: 32
        FullscreenViewportX: $RESOLUTION_WIDTH
        FullscreenViewportY: $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT
        UseDirectDraw: true
        UseJoystick: false
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/System/Default.ini
    merge: true
- input_menu:
    description: 'What is your screen ratio:'
    id: fov
    options:
    - 91: 16/9
    - 85: 16/10
    - autre: other or do not know
    preselect: 91
- write_config:
    data:
      Engine.Input:
        B: Look
        MouseWheelUp: null
        Shift: null
        V: ZTargetToggle
      Engine.PlayerPawn:
        DefaultFOV: $INPUT_fov.000000
        DesiredFOV: $INPUT_fov.000000
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/System/DefUser.ini
    merge: true
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppx360
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppsteam
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppreadme
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: EAXEnabled
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DirectSound
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/System/Rune.ini
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rune Classic/System/OpenAL32.dll
